description: Odd n divisible by a square > 1.
comments: Odd n such that sum(k=1,n-1,floor(k^3/n)) is different from (1/4)*(n-2)*(n^2-1) (equality holds for n prime as well as for "1" union "A024556" ). - _Benoit Cloitre_, Dec 08 2002Odd nonsquarefree numbers, odd terms of A013929. - _Zak Seidov_, Aug 16 2006
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime Sums
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {forstep(n=1, nn, 2, if (! issquarefree(n), print1(n, ", ")));} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 06 2014
author: _Enoch Haga_, Mar 28 2000
